page.title: 11EVERGREENS
page.content: {The Evergreens}is a place where old people live.Most people enjoy living here.The Evergreens is 7 years old.In the building there is a wooden rail to hold on to.There is a lift and stairs in the building.There are 33 flats,6 bathrooms,lounge,laundry room,libary, boiler room,delivery room,kitchen and a telephone box.42 people live there. Mrs Mastin has been there the longest time.They can have meals on wheels twice a week.The rest of them cater for themselves .The warden goes round at 9.10am but unlocks the door at 7.30am.The name Evergreens was selected by the Parish Council.They all make their own meals every morning.More women live here than men and somepeople might think it was an old ladies home.These are some of the hobbies people have -knitting,reading ,sewing,jigsaw puzzles,gardening.
